snippet: Eight-time winner Rafael Nadal beat 12th-seeded Fabio Fognini 6-2, 7-6 (1) to advance to the semifinals of the Barcelona Open on Friday, avenging a loss to the Italian at the tournament last year....
lead_paragraph: Eight-time winner Rafael Nadal beat 12th-seeded Fabio Fognini 6-2, 7-6 (1) to advance to the semifinals of the Barcelona Open on Friday, avenging a loss to the Italian at the tournament last year.

headline.print_headline: Nadal in Barcelona Semifinals After Avenging Loss to Fognini
headline.main: Rafael Nadal in Barcelona Semifinals After Avenging Loss to Fognini
